issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

ATTACHMENT ID: 12947854 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Hi [~asinkovits] Thanks for the patch. Can you give a example of test failure? The partitions are returned sorted by PART_ID so I wonder why the order of partitions is different that partitions returned by {{getPartitions}}
